attributes.action: Freeze the salary of all Members of Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
It is showing contempt for the public, many who have lost livelihoods, businesses, and more.
To give members an increase in salary, is insulting, as they have not attended to vote on critical matters, and have ignored the voices of the electorate.
attributes.background: Do not give MPs an increase in salary

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting MPs' pay. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: https://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/
